about.title: About Us
about.description: The Mohammed bin Rashid Fund aims to finance innovative entrepreneurial projects for Emirati entrepreneurs—owners of small and medium enterprises—who provide comprehensive study, proper preparation, and expansion in the field of entrepreneurship.
about.subtitle: Our goal is not just to provide money but to prepare a new generation of entrepreneurs.
about.missionDesc:
Supporting investment and encouraging innovation.
Our goal is not just to provide money,
but to prepare a generation of entrepreneurs.
about.visionDesc:
Investing in small and medium enterprises
and preparing a generation of local Emirati investors.

media.title: Media Center
media.comingSoon: This section will be added later

items.1: Emirates Islamic Bank agrees to finance 80% of the Fund's projects
items.2: The Fund signs an MoU with Emirates Islamic Bank
items.3: Signing an MoU with ADNEC to support SMEs

descriptions.1: This agreement empowers entrepreneurs by providing financing that covers a significant portion of their setup and operational costs, enabling them to expand more confidently and develop their products and services. It also offers a comprehensive support system that includes training, follow-up, and mentorship—ultimately improving the success rate of entrepreneurial ventures and boosting their contribution to the local economy.
descriptions.2: The Memorandum of Understanding with Emirates Islamic aims to expand financing options available for entrepreneurs by providing seamless and efficient banking services powered by innovative digital solutions. The agreement includes flexible financing programs tailored to the needs of business owners, along with expert financial advisory services that help them manage their projects more effectively and enhance their growth and sustainability.
descriptions.3: This collaboration with ADNEC aims to support the growth of small and medium enterprises by launching joint initiatives that offer specialized support programs, innovative exhibition spaces for entrepreneurs, and training workshops designed to enhance their readiness for market entry. The partnership also focuses on building strong networking channels between business owners and investors, driving innovation and strengthening the national economic ecosystem.

hero.title: Mohammed Bin Rashid Fund for SMEs
hero.description: We support Emirati entrepreneurs by providing financial backing, guidance, and mentorship to develop innovative projects and expand their small and medium enterprises. Our aim is to foster a new generation of successful business leaders in the UAE.

initiatives.title: Strategic Initiatives
initiatives.subtitle: Driving transformation through impactful initiatives that support progress and innovation.
initiatives.card1Desc: Developing modern strategies that align with global transformations.
initiatives.card2Desc: Implementing initiatives with high efficiency and measurable results.
initiatives.card3Desc: Enhancing operational processes to ensure sustainable development.
initiatives.card4Desc: Building innovative solutions through collaboration and strategic partnerships.

contact.title: Contact us
contact.subtitle1: Contact us about anything related to our company or services.
contact.subtitle2: We'll do our best to get back to you as soon as possible.
